attributes.action: create a bank holiday to celebrate the city of Liverpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To celebrate the launch of Liverpool Day at this year’s John Smith's Grand National meeting, 8th - 10th April, we are starting a campaign to get the city its own bank holiday. 

The idea is to get at least 500,000 people to sign up so we can submit a formal application to government in order to get the day officially recognised. 

The Aussies have led the way by designating a national bank holiday for their world famous horse race, the Melbourne Cup, and we don't think that Liverpool should be any different. 

'Liverpool' Day will be a celebration of all the wonderful aspects of living in the UK's most vibrant and creative city and we want everyone to be able to join in. 

So join now and tell us why this great city should have it's own bank holiday...
